```{r}
library(INLA)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)

x <- 1:7
y <- c(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 2, 0)
data.inla <- list(y = y, x = x)

formula.rw1 <- y ~ 1 + f(x, model = 'rw1', scale.model = TRUE,
                         hyper = list(theta = list(prior = 'pc.prec',
                                                   param = c(1, 0.01))))
formula.ar1 <- y ~ 1 + f(x, model = 'ar1',
                         hyper = list(prec = list(param = c(1, 0.01))))
model.rw1 <- inla(formula.rw1, family = 'poisson', data = data.inla)
model.ar1 <- inla(formula.ar1, family = 'poisson', data = data.inla)
```

```{r fig.height=3}
myplot <- function(x, y, model, title) {
    f.hat <- model$summary.random$x$mean
    f.lb <- model$summary.random$x$'0.025quant'
    f.ub <- model$summary.random$x$'0.975quant'
    data.plot <- data.frame(y = y, x = x,
                            f.hat = f.hat,
                            f.lb = f.lb, f.ub = f.ub)
    ggplot(data.plot, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
        geom_line(aes(y = f.hat), col = "#0080ff", size = 1) +
        geom_ribbon(aes(ymin = f.lb, ymax = f.ub),
                    alpha = 0.3, size = 0.75,
                    fill = "orange", col = "#0080ff") +
        geom_point(aes(y = y)) +
        theme_minimal() +
        theme(plot.title = element_text(
                  margin = unit(c(t = 0, r = 0, b = 3, l = 0), 'mm')),
              axis.title.x = element_text(
                  margin = unit(c(t = 2, r = 0, b = 0, l = 0), "mm")),
              axis.title.y = element_text(
                  margin = unit(c(t = 0, r = 2, b = 0, l = 0), "mm"))) +
        labs(x = 'Days', y = 'Count', title = title)
}
plot.rw1 <- myplot(x = x, y = y, model = model.rw1,
                   title = '1st order random walk, RW(1)') 
plot.ar1 <- myplot(x = x, y = y, model = model.ar1,
                   title = '1st order autoregressive model, AR(1)')
plot.rw1 | plot.ar1
```
